item.title: flannel网络部署
item.description: flannel网络部署 简介 Flannel is a simple and easy way to configure a layer 3 network fabric designed for Kubernetes. Flannel runs a small, single binary agent called flanneld on each host, and is responsible for allocating a subnet lease to each host out of a larger, preconfigured address space.
